message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to acquire this item. Our initial offer is $13500. We understand its value to you is $12000, so we hope this price reflects a fair compromise while allowing us to recoup our investment.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm making a counteroffer of $12500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your offer, we would like to propose a counter-counteroffer of $13000 for the product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between our original offer and your revised proposal.

I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to make one more attempt to reach an agreement. I'm willing to meet you at $12000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
